title: Sumar Moonji Kumaru Lyrics Bruce Lee
stanzas: <div>Bruce Lee Sumar Moonji Kumaru Song Lyrics

thaaru thagara dappaa
sumar moonji kumaru
kurukka pesidaadha
konjam neram summarru

summana scena pottu
enga kitta kaattaadha
naangale karuppu gulla
palaya padam ottaadhe

pachcha pulla enna ippo
baashaavathan aakki putta
goyyaala

attu malaa irundha enna
gettup ellaam maathivittu
hit-tu aalaa maathiputtaale

yeda kodum
seena podum
gaana paadam da

en gaana-vula
karutha kelu
nalla paadam da

kavaa moodu
gammunu keda
kayya udaatha

ye kachchaa muchchaa
echcha kudi
vaaya udaatha

suththala karula katta
kannaalaye urula vitta
kaaththaadi pola naanum
buildup la perala vutten

meyyaaluma kelu machchaan
maja scene-nu aalu machchaan
chinna-thula don-u machchaan
naan super star-u fan-u machchaan

atta kaththi mokka kathi
jigidi kattidaa
naan saanavathaan
pudikkaadha
sharppu kaththi daa

thadiye edukkaadha
thandaalu kaaren daa
naa bat-te thottu
paarkkaadha
Tendukar-ru daa

thavvulunda irukkundhunu
erumba poi nasukkula
kaadhukulla poondhukinna
kayya vuttu kasakkura

atom bomb-u
sounda kaettu
alarinu oduvadaa

epudi neeyum engakitta
ondikondi modhuvadaa

silpaaana sarikku vidum
saanaa kallu daa
en body oru
jarkkaa vaathaa
paenaa mulludaa

vartha meenu
odamba vachchu
vala aattuven

naan orey oru
kaisaa maala
vela kaattuven

thaaru thagara dappaa
sumar moonji kumaru
kurukka pesidaadha
konjam neram summarru

summana scena pottu
enga kitta kaattaadha
naangale karuppu gulla
palaya padam ottaadhe

pachcha pulla enna ippo
baashaavathan aakki putta
goyyaala

attu malaa irundha enna
gettup ellaam maathivittu
hit-tu aalaa maathiputtaale

yeda kodum
seena podum
gaana paadam da

en gaana-vula
karutha kelu
nalla paadam da

kavaa moodu
gammunu keda
kayya udaatha

ye kachchaa muchchaa
echcha kudi
vaaya udaatha

seo.title: Sumar Moonji Kumaru Lyrics Bruce Lee
seo.description: Get the complete Sumar Moonji Kumaru Lyrics Bruce Lee from Bruce Lee. Read the lyrics penned by Gana Vinoth and composed by Ganesan Sekar and sung by Simbu. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Gana Vinoth, Bruce Lee, Ganesan Sekar, Simbu, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
